subject: Re: Greetings from a New Member
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I'm glad my site made you interested in this, i guess it's 
working !!!  We just have to get the word out there.

-Steve H. ---"The Recruiter"



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, rednellie <rednellie@...> wrote:
>
> Steve Hultay wrote:
> >  Nellie,
> >
> >  That one file "What are you to me?" A man answers clearly i 
believe
> >  says "Nothing". That is a real EVP, probably a class A and that 
did
> >  not come from the box.
> 
> It must be a Class B, then, as I am hearing "husband".  That fits 
with 
> the other one where he says I'm his wife.  He has been trying to 
> convince me for over a year that I am the reincarnation of his long 
dead 
> spouse, so I was quite intrigued to get these as some of the 
results 
> from my very first day trying ITC work.
> 
> >  That was spoken directly into your recorder. I
> >  get them on occasion, i feel that only happens with a grounded 
spirit
> >  in a location and is confused by the box....Maybe (I don't Know) 
It
> >  sounds somewhat logical though.
> 
> Or it could just be that I have been nagging him to hear his 
voice.  
> Like I said, I'd never managed to get even one evp out of him in 15 
> months of trying.  He's pretty clever, so I couldn't imagine that 
he 
> couldn't figure out how to.  The sense I was getting from him was 
that 
> since he was shot through the throat during the Civil War, he was 
> concerned that he would sound scary if I ever heard him.  It 
actually 
> means a lot to me that he finally let me hear him in his own 
voice.  I 
> guess he now trusts me not to freak out.  As if I ever did.
> 
> >  Anyway, Great Files and welcome to the group !!!
> 
> Thanks!  Actually, it was your site that convinced me to break down 
and 
> give ITC work a try.
> 
> 
> Nellie
>
